release_notes: Room Capture email templates, Shortcuts tab, Quick Print templates, Invoice deletion
changelog: NEW: Room Capture Email Template Picker - choose template before sending
NEW: Shortcuts Tab - configure toolbar buttons and print templates
NEW: Quick Print Templates - auto-select Print dialog templates
NEW: Invoice Deletion - Ctrl+Click Sync Invoice to delete last invoice
IMPROVED: Email Template Refresh button fetches templates from GHL
IMPROVED: Cancel button on Client ID Found dialog
FIX: Command quoting for Python script execution
FIX: Global variable declarations for template pickers
